text: Þis sind þara X hida landgemæra to henna Riðe.
Ærest on þane litlan wyl of þan wylle on Rypelme hlau of þam hlauue andlang heafde þæt hit cymð on þæt heafod lond on west healf ðrym beorgan.
Þonne of ðan heafod londe on þon gratan ðorn styb.
Of þam stybbe on læce mære.
Of þam mere on wanetinge brog andlang broces þæt hit cymð to þære dic to stifingehaeme gemæra.
Andlangan heafdan estweard<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þæs ealdormonnes gemære þonon suð andlang heafdu<../images/tbar.gif>on risc broc.
Þwyres ofer risc broc andlang heafdan þat hit cymð on lacynge broc on þon lytlan wyl.
Andlang broces on þone oðerne wyl þonne suð andlang heafda on abban byorh.
Andlang heafda on blacan hylle suðewearde of þære hylle west twa furlang to þan heofdland.
Andlang heofd<../images/tbar.gif>hit sticað on ðære dic andlang broce.
West andlang broces eft on þone litlan wyl þær ic ær on feng.
Seo mæd is on west healf waneting þe gebureð ing to ðan X hidan.
